mapper.select: SELECT m.id FROM t_menu m INNER JOIN t_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN t_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN t_user u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT path, name AS title, icon FROM t_menu WHERE id = #{menuId} AND parentMenuId IS NULL
SELECT path,name AS title,linkUrl FROM t_menu WHERE id = #{id} AND parentMenuId = #{parentMenuId}
